about_the_game:
After collecting the ancient relic from the top of the Puzzle Tower, you must descend into the catacombs to uncover the dark secrets of the tower's history. As you descend deeper into the catacombs, you'll face numerous puzzles, traps, and monsters that will try to stop you. You've conquered monsters, puzzles, and traps in the past, but you've never faced anything like what you're about to see.

Puzzle Tower Underground brings brand new puzzles, items, bosses, and more to the original story of Puzzle Tower. The story of Underground directly follows Puzzle Tower's main story. Starting from the bottom of the tower, you must descend deeper and deeper into the tower's catacombs to uncover the history of the tower. You'll be completing new puzzles, collecting new items, slaying new bosses, and more. Are you skilled enough to reach the deepest part of the catacombs and uncover the secrets?

Features
- 10 new levels
- 15+ new puzzles
- New mechanics (combat oriented puzzles)
- New items
- New soundtracks
- Brand new Steam Achievements
- Extensive single player experience with medieval atmosphere

content_descriptors.notes: Slight actions of violence and/or gore present numerous times throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-Bit versions only)
  • Processor: 2.5GHz minimum
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-Bit versions only)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: After exploring the Puzzle Tower, descend into its catacombs to uncover the dark secrets of the tower's history. Each room is full of unique puzzles, traps, and monsters. Can you reach the bottom and uncover the secrets?
